Mastering the art of mind-reading: This would allow you to know what people are thinking and feeling without them having to express it verbally. It would help you understand people better, improve your communication skills, and make better decisions.

Mastering the art of mind control: This would allow you to control the thoughts and actions of others, making you a powerful force in any situation. You could use it for good or evil purposes, depending on your intentions.
